blocks.name: df-mgp
blocks.content: Define a structure that puts the multiplication operation of a ring in the addition slot. Note that this will not actually be a group for the average ring, or even for a field, but it will be a monoid, and ~ unitgrp shows that we get a group if we restrict to the elements that have inverses. This allows us to formalize such notions as "the multiplication operation of a ring is a monoid" ( ~ ringmgp ) or "the multiplicative identity" in terms of the identity of a monoid ( ~ df-1r ). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Dec-2014.)

blocks.name: fnmgp
blocks.content: The multiplicative group operator is a function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Mar-2015.)

blocks.name: mgpval
blocks.content: Value of the multiplication group operation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Dec-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm mgpval(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(c0, co(c1, csts, cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), c2)))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cmgp, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cmulr, c1))
} = {
  eqtri(c0, co(c1, csts, cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), c2)), cfv(cmgp, c1))
  pm2.61i(wceq(cfv(cmgp, c1), co(c1, csts, cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), c2))), wcel(c1, universe))
  fvmpt(hs0, c1, universe, cmgp, co(c1, csts, cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), c2)), co(cv(hs0), csts, cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cfv(cmulr, cv(hs0)))))
  oveq12d(cv(hs0), csts, cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cfv(cmulr, cv(hs0))), c1, cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  opeq2d(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cfv(cmulr, cv(hs0)), c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cmulr, cv(hs0)), c2, cfv(cmulr, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c1, cmulr)
  df-mgp(hs0)
  ovex(c1, csts, cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), c2))
  eqtr4d(cfv(cmgp, c1), co(c1, csts, cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), c2)), emptycls, wn(wcel(c1, universe)))
  fvprc(c1, cmgp)
  ovprc1(c1, csts, cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), c2))
  reldmsets()
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c1, csts, cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), c2)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mgpval(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ c0 =(c1[sSet]<(+ ` ndx), c2 >)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(mulGrp ` c1)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(√ó ` c1)
} = {
  eqtri(c0, (c1[sSet]<(+ ` ndx), c2 >), (mulGrp ` c1))
  pm2.61i((mulGrp ` c1)=(c1[sSet]<(+ ` ndx), c2 >), c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvmpt(hs0, c1, universe, cmgp, (c1[sSet]<(+ ` ndx), c2 >), (hs0[sSet]<(+ ` ndx),(√ó ` hs0)>))
  oveq12d(hs0, csts, <(+ ` ndx),(√ó ` hs0)>, c1, <(+ ` ndx), c2 >, hs0 = c1)
  id(hs0 = c1)
  opeq2d((+ ` ndx), (√ó ` hs0), c2, hs0 = c1)
  syl6eqr((√ó ` hs0), c2, (√ó ` c1), hs0 = c1)
  fveq2(hs0, c1, cmulr)
  df-mgp(hs0)
  ovex(c1, csts, <(+ ` ndx), c2 >)
  eqtr4d((mulGrp ` c1), (c1[sSet]<(+ ` ndx), c2 >), emptycls, ¬¨ c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvprc(c1, cmgp)
  ovprc1(c1, csts, <(+ ` ndx), c2 >)
  reldmsets()
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c((c1[sSet]<(+ ` ndx), c2 >))
}

blocks.name: mgpplusg
blocks.content: Value of the group operation of the multiplication group. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Dec-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm mgpplusg(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(c0, cfv(cplusg, c1))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cmgp, c2))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cmulr, c2))
} = {
  pm2.61i(wceq(c0, cfv(cplusg, c1)), wcel(c2, universe))
  syl6eqr(c0, cfv(cplusg, c1), cfv(cplusg, co(c2, csts, cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), c0))), wcel(c2, universe))
  mpan2(wcel(c2, universe), wceq(c0, cfv(cplusg, co(c2, csts, cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), c0)))), wcel(c0, universe))
  fvexi(c0, cmulr, c2)
  setsid(c2, universe, c0, universe, cplusg)
  fveq2i(cplusg, c1, co(c2, csts, cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), c0)))
  mgpval(c1, c2, c0)
  3eqtr4a(c0, cfv(cplusg, c1), emptycls, cfv(cplusg, emptycls), wn(wcel(c2, universe)))
  str0(cplusg, cfv(cplusg, cnx))
  plusgid()
  syl5eq(c0, emptycls, cfv(cmulr, c2), wn(wcel(c2, universe)))
  fvprc(c2, cmulr)
  fveq2d(cplusg, c1, emptycls, wn(wcel(c2, universe)))
  syl5eq(c1, emptycls, cfv(cmgp, c2), wn(wcel(c2, universe)))
  fvprc(c2, cmgp)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mgpplusg(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ c0 =(+ ` c1)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(mulGrp ` c2)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(√ó ` c2)
} = {
  pm2.61i(c0 =(+ ` c1), c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  syl6eqr(c0, (+ ` c1), (+ `(c2[sSet]<(+ ` ndx), c0 >)), c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  mpan2(c2 ‚àà ùïå, c0 =(+ `(c2[sSet]<(+ ` ndx), c0 >)), c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvexi(c0, cmulr, c2)
  setsid(c2, universe, c0, universe, cplusg)
  fveq2i(cplusg, c1, (c2[sSet]<(+ ` ndx), c0 >))
  mgpval(c1, c2, c0)
  3eqtr4a(c0, (+ ` c1), emptycls, (+ ` ‚àÖ), ¬¨ c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  str0(cplusg, (+ ` ndx))
  plusgid()
  syl5eq(c0, emptycls, (√ó ` c2), ¬¨ c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvprc(c2, cmulr)
  fveq2d(cplusg, c1, emptycls, ¬¨ c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  syl5eq(c1, emptycls, (mulGrp ` c2), ¬¨ c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvprc(c2, cmgp)
}

blocks.name: mgplem
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ mgpbas . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm mgplem(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, c2))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cmgp, c1))
  -| wceq(c0, cslot(c3))
  -| wcel(c3, cn)
  -| wne(c3, nat2)
} = {
  eqtr4i(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c0, co(c1, csts, cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cfv(cmulr, c1)))))
  setsnid(c0, c1, cfv(cplusg, cnx), cfv(cmulr, c1))
  ndxid(c0, c3)
  mpbir(wne(cfv(c0, cnx), cfv(cplusg, cnx)), wne(c3, nat2))
  neeq12i(cfv(c0, cnx), cfv(cplusg, cnx), c3, nat2)
  ndxarg(c0, c3)
  plusgndx()
  fveq2i(c0, c2, co(c1, csts, cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cfv(cmulr, c1))))
  mgpval(c2, c1, cfv(cmulr, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cmulr, c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mgplem(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ` c1)=(c0 ` c2)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(mulGrp ` c1)
  ‚ä£ c0 = Slot(c3)
  ‚ä£ c3 ‚àà ‚Ñï
  ‚ä£ c3 ‚â† 2
} = {
  eqtr4i((c0 ` c1), (c0 ` c2), (c0 `(c1[sSet]<(+ ` ndx),(√ó ` c1)>)))
  setsnid(c0, c1, (+ ` ndx), (√ó ` c1))
  ndxid(c0, c3)
  mpbir((c0 ` ndx)‚â†(+ ` ndx), c3 ‚â† 2)
  neeq12i((c0 ` ndx), (+ ` ndx), c3, nat2)
  ndxarg(c0, c3)
  plusgndx()
  fveq2i(c0, c2, (c1[sSet]<(+ ` ndx),(√ó ` c1)>))
  mgpval(c2, c1, (√ó ` c1))
  eqid((√ó ` c1))
}

blocks.name: mgpbas
blocks.content: Base set of the multiplication group. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Dec-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 5-Oct-2015.)

blocks.name: mgpsca
blocks.content: The multiplication monoid has the same (if any) scalars as the original ring. Mostly to simplify ~ pwsmgp . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Mar-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 5-May-2015.)

blocks.name: mgptset
blocks.content: Topology component of the multiplication group. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Oct-2015.)

blocks.name: mgptopn
blocks.content: Topology of the multiplication group. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Oct-2015.)

blocks.name: mgpds
blocks.content: Distance function of the multiplication group. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm mgpds(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(c0, cfv(cds, c1))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cmgp, c2))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cds, c2))
} = {
  eqtri(c0, cfv(cds, c1), cfv(cds, c2))
  mgplem(cds, c2, c1, cdc(nat1, nat2))
  df-ds()
  decnncl(nat1, nat2)
  1nn0()
  2nn()
  gtneii(cdc(nat1, nat2), nat2)
  2re()
  declti(nat2, nat1, nat2)
  1nn()
  2nn0()
  2lt10()
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mgpds(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ c0 =(dist ` c1)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(mulGrp ` c2)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(dist ` c2)
} = {
  eqtri(c0, (dist ` c1), (dist ` c2))
  mgplem(cds, c2, c1, cdc(1, 2))
  df-ds()
  decnncl(nat1, nat2)
  1nn0()
  2nn()
  gtneii(cdc(1, 2), nat2)
  2re()
  declti(nat2, nat1, nat2)
  1nn()
  2nn0()
  2lt10()
}

blocks.name: mgpress
blocks.content: Subgroup commutes with the multiplication group operator. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm mgpress(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(co(c4, cress, c2), cfv(cmgp, c5)))
  -| wceq(c5, co(c0, cress, c2))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cmgp, c0))
} = {
  pm2.61dan(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(co(c4, cress, c2), cfv(cmgp, c5)), wss(cfv(cbs, c0), c2))
  3eqtr4a(co(c4, cress, c2), cfv(cmgp, c5), c4, cfv(cmgp, c0), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wss(cfv(cbs, c0), c2)))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wss(cfv(cbs, c0), c2)), wceq(co(c4, cress, c2), c4), wss(cfv(cbs, c0), c2), wcel(c4, universe), wcel(c2, c3))
  a1i(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wss(cfv(cbs, c0), c2)), wcel(c4, universe))
  ressid2(cfv(cbs, c0), c2, c4, universe, c3, co(c4, cress, c2))
  fveq2d(cmgp, c5, c0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wss(cfv(cbs, c0), c2)))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wss(cfv(cbs, c0), c2)), wceq(c5, c0), wss(cfv(cbs, c0), c2), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3))
  simpr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wss(cfv(cbs, c0), c2))
  simpll(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wss(cfv(cbs, c0), c2))
  simplr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wss(cfv(cbs, c0), c2))
  ressid2(cfv(cbs, c0), c2, c0, c1, c3, c5)
  3eqtr4a(co(c4, cress, c2), cfv(cmgp, c5), co(c4, csts, cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cin(c2, cfv(cbs, c0)))), co(co(c0, csts, cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cfv(cmulr, c0))), csts, cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cin(c2, cfv(cbs, c0)))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wn(wss(cfv(cbs, c0), c2))))
  oveq1i(c4, csts, cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cin(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))), co(c0, csts, cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cfv(cmulr, c0))))
  mgpval(c4, c0, cfv(cmulr, c0))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wn(wss(cfv(cbs, c0), c2))), wceq(co(c4, cress, c2), co(c4, csts, cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cin(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))))), wn(wss(cfv(cbs, c0), c2)), wcel(c4, universe), wcel(c2, c3))
  a1i(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wn(wss(cfv(cbs, c0), c2))), wcel(c4, universe))
  fvexi(c4, cmgp, c0)
  ressval2(cfv(cbs, c0), c2, c4, universe, c3, co(c4, cress, c2))
  eqid(co(c4, cress, c2))
  mgpbas(cfv(cbs, c0), c4, c0)
  eqtr4d(cfv(cmgp, c5), co(co(c0, csts, cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cfv(cmulr, c0))), csts, cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cin(c2, cfv(cbs, c0)))), co(co(c0, csts, cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cin(c2, cfv(cbs, c0)))), csts, cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cfv(cmulr, c0))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wn(wss(cfv(cbs, c0), c2))))
  syl5eq(cfv(cmgp, c5), co(co(c0, csts, cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cin(c2, cfv(cbs, c0)))), csts, cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cfv(cmulr, c0))), co(c5, csts, cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cfv(cmulr, c5))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wn(wss(cfv(cbs, c0), c2))))
  mgpval(cfv(cmgp, c5), c5, cfv(cmulr, c5))
  eqid(cfv(cmgp, c5))
  eqid(cfv(cmulr, c5))
  oveq12d(c5, csts, cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cfv(cmulr, c5)), co(c0, csts, cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cin(c2, cfv(cbs, c0)))), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cfv(cmulr, c0)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wn(wss(cfv(cbs, c0), c2))))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wn(wss(cfv(cbs, c0), c2))), wceq(c5, co(c0, csts, cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cin(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))))), wn(wss(cfv(cbs, c0), c2)), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3))
  simpr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wn(wss(cfv(cbs, c0), c2)))
  simplr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wn(wss(cfv(cbs, c0), c2)))
  ressval2(cfv(cbs, c0), c2, c0, c1, c3, c5)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  opeq2d(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cfv(cmulr, c5), cfv(cmulr, c0), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wn(wss(cfv(cbs, c0), c2))))
  ad2antlr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wn(wss(cfv(cbs, c0), c2)), wceq(cfv(cmulr, c5), cfv(cmulr, c0)))
  eqcomd(cfv(cmulr, c5), cfv(cmulr, c0), wcel(c2, c3))
  ressmulr(c2, c3, cfv(cmulr, c0), c5, c0)
  eqid(cfv(cmulr, c0))
  sylancl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wn(wss(cfv(cbs, c0), c2))), wceq(co(co(c0, csts, cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cfv(cmulr, c0))), csts, cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cin(c2, cfv(cbs, c0)))), co(co(c0, csts, cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cin(c2, cfv(cbs, c0)))), csts, cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cfv(cmulr, c0)))), wcel(c0, c1), wne(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cfv(cbs, cnx)))
  simpll(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wn(wss(cfv(cbs, c0), c2)))
  mpbir(wne(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cfv(cbs, cnx)), wne(nat2, nat1))
  necomi(nat2, nat1)
  1ne2()
  neeq12i(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cfv(cbs, cnx), nat2, nat1)
  plusgndx()
  basendx()
  mpanr12(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wne(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cfv(cbs, cnx))), wceq(co(co(c0, csts, cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cfv(cmulr, c0))), csts, cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cin(c2, cfv(cbs, c0)))), co(co(c0, csts, cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cin(c2, cfv(cbs, c0)))), csts, cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cfv(cmulr, c0)))), wcel(cfv(cmulr, c0), universe), wcel(cin(c2, cfv(cbs, c0)), universe))
  fvex(cmulr, c0)
  inex2(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  fvex(cbs, c0)
  setscom(c0, c1, cfv(cplusg, cnx), cfv(cbs, cnx), cfv(cmulr, c0), universe, cin(c2, cfv(cbs, c0)), universe)
  fvex(cplusg, cnx)
  fvex(cbs, cnx)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mgpress(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí(c4[|`s]c2)=(mulGrp ` c5))
  ‚ä£ c5 =(c0[|`s]c2)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(mulGrp ` c0)
} = {
  pm2.61dan((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3), (c4[|`s]c2)=(mulGrp ` c5), (Base ` c0)‚äÜ c2)
  3eqtr4a((c4[|`s]c2), (mulGrp ` c5), c4, (mulGrp ` c0), ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚àß(Base ` c0)‚äÜ c2))
  syl3anc(((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚àß(Base ` c0)‚äÜ c2), (c4[|`s]c2)= c4, (Base ` c0)‚äÜ c2, c4 ‚àà ùïå, c2 ‚àà c3)
  a1i(((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚àß(Base ` c0)‚äÜ c2), c4 ‚àà ùïå)
  ressid2((Base ` c0), c2, c4, universe, c3, (c4[|`s]c2))
  fveq2d(cmgp, c5, c0, ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚àß(Base ` c0)‚äÜ c2))
  syl3anc(((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚àß(Base ` c0)‚äÜ c2), c5 = c0, (Base ` c0)‚äÜ c2, c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3)
  simpr((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3), (Base ` c0)‚äÜ c2)
  simpll(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, (Base ` c0)‚äÜ c2)
  simplr(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, (Base ` c0)‚äÜ c2)
  ressid2((Base ` c0), c2, c0, c1, c3, c5)
  3eqtr4a((c4[|`s]c2), (mulGrp ` c5), (c4[sSet]<(Base ` ndx),(c2 ‚ãÇ(Base ` c0))>), ((c0[sSet]<(+ ` ndx),(√ó ` c0)>)[sSet]<(Base ` ndx),(c2 ‚ãÇ(Base ` c0))>), ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚àß ¬¨(Base ` c0)‚äÜ c2))
  oveq1i(c4, csts, <(Base ` ndx),(c2 ‚ãÇ(Base ` c0))>, (c0[sSet]<(+ ` ndx),(√ó ` c0)>))
